name: Krozok go FISH!
description:
Immerse yourself in a deep story written an hour before the submission deadline.

Pick an appropriate bait from your inventory screen.

Launch the hook towards humans.

Humans have 3 Health points, so don't smack them into asteroids!

For every time you smack human into a rock you lose 100 points.

Try not to kill them.

Get maximum amount of points for special prize!

CONTROLS: 

Inventory button (or I) - Pick a bait for your hook

Hold LEFT CLICK (or SPACE) to move the hook

A and D (or Left and Right Arrow) - Move the hook left and right

Reel in button (or R) - Reel in mode

Look down button (or X) - Look down at the humans

This is an improved version of our game from MiniJam91. Original version of the game is available for download below.
